channel.title: Blogs | rdsx.dev
channel.description: Blogs | rdsx.dev | Hey! I am RDS (Rudro Dip Sarker), and its my personal blog where I share my learnings, experiences, and thoughts on different topics. I mostly talk about tech, but I don't have any specific niche. I write about whatever I find interesting. I hope you will find my blogs helpful. Happy reading!

item.title: On scroll video playback effect
item.description: Let's create an on scroll video playback effect using ffmpeg, framer-motion & nextjs
